EmailTemplate.subject: BlueWave Solar Makes Solar Ownership Even Easier for Customers in MA!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Make way for a new Home Solar Loan
You wanted it, you got it. BlueWave Solar will now be offering 18 month interest-only payments and fixed monthly payments for SRECs to all new BlueWave Home Solar Loan customers in Massachusetts!
Bringing customers confidence in solar ownership.
What's new?
Fixed monthly payments for SRECs for all qualifying customers based on system size! An extended 18 month interest-only payment period for the loan, now standard, allowing for greater payment flexibility!
What's always been great about BlueWave loans?
Simplicity in signing up for loan approval Zero payments due until after system construction ends Best in class disbursal schedule BlueWave Customer Care available to answer questions before, during, and after a customer applies for a loan
Interested? Contact Wells or Jessica.
Or check out our website here
We're always here for you. Partner Support Line: 888.817.2703 Partner Support Email: partnersupport@bluewavesolar.com
